```{r  include=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)
library(ggiraph)
```


```{r}
ggpobj = ggplot(economics, aes(date, unemploy)) + geom_line(col="white") + geom_point(col="white") +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#e93a76",
                                        color=NA),
        plot.background = element_rect(fill=rgb(0,0,0,0),color=NA),
        axis.text=element_blank()) + xlab("") + ylab("")
girafe(ggobj = ggpobj, width=4,height=2)

```
